      static Bitmap getAvatorBitmap(EMUser user)
      if the user is in the contact, get the avator using get getThumbAvatorBitmap if the user is not in the contect, try to load from uesr.getPicture if the picture is not exist, download the picture async, and return default avator

      上传图片list，会压缩较大的图片，上传时，如果某张图片上传失败，会重复上传一次

      • getAvatorBitmap

        public static Bitmap getAvatorBitmap(EMUser user)
        if the user is in the contact, get the avator using get getThumbAvatorBitmap if the user is not in the contect, try to load from uesr.getPicture if the picture is not exist, download the picture async, and return default avator
        Parameters:

        Returns:
